text: @WhiteHouse @realDonaldTrump Listening to Governor Cuomo. He is now my resource for Coronavirus info. He is factual and to the point. He has genuine empathy for his constituents. I decided it is far more helpful to listen to him. No longer paying attention to the presidential false reality show.

entity.name: Updates on COVID-19 in Australia
entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with information and advice from the prime minister, state and federal governments, health authorities and other trusted sources from around Australia. For more, visit https://www.health.gov.au/.
